Text: The patch is an .exe file named patch ... there's no where to put this file, and when trying to open it, I get an error then multiple hacktool warnings. Since its not able to even patch it, I'll pass this one up.

I'm not sure why the "fix" isn't just a couple files we can manually copy into the Trillian directory. And this new patch was released *very* quickly after Trillian started auto-updating to Build 33.

Even though arulkarthik is a reputable uploader, I think I'm going to pass on this as well.
Patch works great, same as build 32 patch, Put in Program Files/Trillian directory and Run as Admin.

patch isn't working, I put in trillian directory, ran it both as admin and not as an admin, and it said  nothing patched!  I even logged into trillian after it was done and i get those crappy ads in the window still.
of course it's working, you just need to edit the folder permissions to allow programs to write or edit files
Works and is clean. (AVG pop'ed up with hack tool no infections though)

Hm, I'm not sure it works for the 34 build. I installed it, patched it, it auto-updated to 34 and said I wasn't supreme overlord. So I patched it again and it says I'm supreme overlord and just when I thought it was good, there was an ad in my chat window for Trillian Pro.
